article_title: The doctor is in: LG Northam speaks softly, carries big Democratic hopes for 2017
article_text:

og.description: Being lieutenant governor means that every once in a while, you get to stand in for the governor and take on important jobs, such as commemorating the birthday of Smokey Bear.
og.title: The doctor is in: LG Northam speaks softly, carries big Democratic hopes for 2017
